QuestData.Title: Battle for Azeroth: Mission Statement
QuestData.Description:
The warchief has requested to meet with you in person.
Lady Sylvanas was impressed with the prowess and courage you displayed during our mission to Exile's Reach.
Now that you've arrived, I will make the introduction.
QuestData.LogDescription: Attend the war meeting in Grommash Hold.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Nathanos Blightcalled in Zuldazar.

Objectives.Objective: Wyvern rode to Princess Talanji's boat
